title.narrative: Procurement of services to implement the scaling up of family planning services programme

description.narrative: This activity (Procurement of services to implement the scaling up of family planning services programme) is a component of Scaling Up Access to Family Planning Services in Zambia reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £16,286,905. This component benefits Zambia, and works in the following sector(s): Reproductive health care, Family planning. , with the following implementing partners: Abt Associates Inc. The start date is 01-03-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2019.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
